name: Material Exchange Format (MXF) -- MXF Generic Container
definition: The native essence container for the MXF file format that carries video, audio, metadata and other 'payloads,' i.e., bitstreams called essences in the audio-visual community.  The container is described as 'streamable,' meaning that its audio-visual content can be 'continuously decoded through mechanisms such as interleaving essence components with stream-based metadata.'
